Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: integrate data from several tables into comprehensive event log Case ID Activity Name Timestamp Resource Actor Other Attributes

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Use order_id as case identifier for each process instance

Name: Hypothesis Generation - IND
Text: Resource Actor maybe Salesperson SP or System or Order Processor

Name: Inductive Reasoning - IND
Text: convert key steps Order Created Items Picked Order Dispatched Order Arrived Invoice Issued Payment Received into events

Name: Abductive Reasoning - PE
Text: for Order 1001 events Order Created Items Picked Order Dispatched Order Arrived Invoice Issued Payment Received in chronological sequence

Name: Heuristic Reasoning - NE
Text: assume timestamps like Items Picked at 1015 or 1100 Order Dispatched after picking even if data suggests otherwise

Name: Backtracking - NE
Text: delivery for 1001 not present but actually DLV5001 is there need to align properly

Name: Validation - IND
Text: ensure chronological order and cover all orders 1001 to 1005
